defs.script:
{
            "code": "journey
  title Customer Journey
  section User Actions
    Browse products: 1
    Add to cart: 2
    Checkout: 3
  section Fulfillment
    Receive order: 4
  section Post-Purchase
    Leave review: 5",
            "theme": "default",
            "themeVariables": {"primaryColor": "#3B82F6", "primaryTextColor": "#1F2937", "primaryBorderColor": null, "lineColor": null, "background": "#FFFFFF"}
        }
